Package evs.gui.utilities

Utility classes for the Graphical User Interface (GUI).

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
TransitionalUnit An interface for updating an existing verification unit with transitional data.
 

Class Summary
AdaptableComboBox Provides a combo box whose menu adapts to the size of the widest item in the menu.
BrowserControl A static class to display a URL in the system browser.
DisplayAUCMethodPar Class for storing and displaying an AUC method parameter in a combo box.
DisplayLogicPar Class for storing and displaying a logical condition in a combo box.
DisplayMetricResult Class for storing a metric result for display in a table.
DisplayReferencePar Class for storing and displaying a reference forecast in a combo box.
DisplayScoreDecompPar Class for storing and displaying score decomposition options in a combo box.
EditorTable Table model that allows a cell editor to be defined for each cell in the table.
ErrorDialog  
EventThreadExceptionHandler Thread to catch unhandled errors/exceptions on the event dispatch thread.
EVSChartUtilities Extends the JFreeChart class to write in additional formats.
EVSFileChooser Extends the default file chooser.
OptionPaneMultiLineUI Class to display an option pane with wrapped text.
ScaleTableModel Table for storing support information.
ScaleTableRenderer Extends the default table cell renderer to allow custom editing of table cell colors for the scale table.
SearchableComboBox Searchable ComboBox.
ToolTipTable Table that displays a tool tip text based on the string representation of the cell value.
TransitionalVU TODO: Consider implementing this class in future to clean-up the GUI code.
 

Package evs.gui.utilities Description

Utility classes for the Graphical User Interface (GUI).
